//功能测试
./idip_test --type=func --ip=192.168.0.6 --port=9010 --path=/qq/idip/send --config_file=cx_idip.xml
//压力测试
./idip_test --type=pressure --ip=192.168.0.6 --port=9010 --thread_count=3 --send_times=5000 --path=/qq/idip/send --config_file=cx_idip.xml --request_file=request.txt

//腾讯测试服
./idip_test --type=func --ip=10.142.5.69 --port=9010 --path=/idip/send --config_file=cx_idip.xml

./idip_test --type=pressure --ip=10.142.5.69 --port=9010 --thread_count=3 --send_times=5000 --path=/idip/send --config_file=cx_idip.xml --request_file=request.txt

//微信
//--ios
//cmd=0x101d&area=1&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&item_id=10806&level=1&item_num=1&source=1&serial=test
//--android
//cmd=0x101d&area=1&platid=1&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&item_id=10806&level=1&item_num=1&source=1&serial=test


//手Q
//--ios
//修改金币
cmd=0x1001&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&value=1&source=1&serial=test
//修改将魂
cmd=0x1003&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&value=3&source=1&serial=test
//修改群英会声望请求
cmd=0x1005&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&value=5&source=1&serial=test
//修改过关斩将功勋请求
cmd=0x1007&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&value=7&source=1&serial=test
//修改体力值请求
cmd=0x1009&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&value=9&source=1&serial=test
//修改主公经验请求
cmd=0x100b&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&value=11&source=1&serial=test
//修改石料数量请求
cmd=0x100d&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&value=13&source=1&serial=test
//修改技能点数目请求
cmd=0x100f&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&value=15&source=1&serial=test
//赠送武将请求
cmd=0x1011&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&item_id=1001&level=2&source=1&serial=test
//删除武将请求
cmd=0x1013&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&item_id=1001&level=2&source=1&serial=test


//赠送装备请求
cmd=0x1019&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&item_id=10001&level=1&item_num=1&source=1&serial=test

//赠送道具
cmd=0x101d&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&item_id=10806&level=1&item_num=1&source=1&serial=test


//--android
cmd=0x101d&area=2&platid=1&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&item_id=10806&level=1&item_num=1&source=1&serial=test

cmd=0x102b&area=2&platid=0&partition=1&openid=B26687C0A3E608AFFE368F28B4056502&item_id=10806&level=1&item_num=1&source=1&serial=test
